faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about our services

questions.question: How long does debt collection take?
questions.answer: The duration of debt collection depends on many factors, such as the amount of the receivable, the availability of the debtor and their willingness to cooperate. Usually, we try for an out-of-court solution, which can take several weeks. In the case of court collection, the time extends to months.

questions.question: How much do your services cost?
questions.answer: Our fee is typically set as a percentage of the collected amount, usually 20-30%. The exact terms depend on the specific case and are always agreed in advance. For more information, visit our pricing page or contact us.

questions.question: Do you collect receivables abroad?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide debt collection services abroad as well. We cooperate with partners in different countries, which allows us to effectively solve international cases as well.
